title: Geepas 1500W Stainless Steel Single Hot Plate – Portable Electric Hob Single Burner with Adjustable Temperature Control, Cast Iron – Lightweight & Portable Great to use at Campsites Caravans & Bedsits
features: CAST IRON, VERSATILE - This 1500W stainless steel hot plate has a high quality and durable cast iron of 185mm heating element for quick and sustained heating. Use with all types of cookware to boil, fry, or keep food warm. Meet all your cooking needs such as to keep warm, boil water, cook pastas or steaks etc.

DURABLE & EASY TO CLEAN, POWER INDICATOR - The cooking plate’s stainless-steel surface is durable, easy to clean and can withstand long term use. Its shape and design also means it is easier to clean. A power indicator is featured on the temperature knob, indicating that the hotplate is on and hot. It is perfect for camping and travelling as it can be easily moved around and is made to last.

THERMOSTATIC ADJUSTABLE CONTROL - Make heating much easier - With thermostatic control the temperature is controlled by a power dial on the front; simply turn the dial to switch it on and select the heat level you need, Ideal from simmering to boiling, heating has never been more easy or simple. The cast-iron ring can heat up to 1500W (1.5kW).

COMPACT & PORTABLE, NON-SLIP RUBBER FEET - This hot plate is not only compact for easy storage, but also portable. We built this hot plate with safety and convenience in mind - The feet of this single hot plate is non-slip.
description: Product Description CAST IRON COOKING SURFACE High quality and durable cast iron of 185mm heating element. SINGLE BURNER Geepas 1500W Stainless Steel Single Hot Plate. FAST HEATING Durable cast iron of 185mm heating element for quick and sustained heating. ADJUSTABLE TEMPERATURE With thermostatic control the temperature is controlled by a power dial on the front. NON-SLIP FEATURE This hot plate with safety and convenience in mind - The feet of this single hot plate is non-slip. OVERHEAT PROTECTION It will automatically power off if it reaches too high of a temperature. INDICATOR LIGHT A power indicator is featured on the temperature knob, indicating that the hotplate is on and hot. COMPACT AND PORTABLE This hot plate is not only compact for easy storage, but also portable.
